name: Mango Man 3D
description:
After his great triumph over the Onion Clan, Mango Man must face his latest challenge, the Clan Kabal...

Mango Man 3D is a first-person adventure game. The character, Mango Man, is a superhero capable of all things mango. In the game, the Clan Kabal, an evil cult, has taken over the village, New Mango, and stolen all of the townspeople’s identities. Mango Man must find the town’s two sacred mangoes and deliver them to the Grandmaster in hiding to restore peace to the community.  

 The game is meant to be a stark contrast to its 2D predecessor, Mango Man, and more so immerse the player into a soothing and calming environment, whereas the previous game was a 2D platformer that consistently required the user’s attention. In this game, the player can freely roam the town and discover mangoes along the way.
